subject: p15131736
History: Year old woman with COPD, dCHF, influenza with hypoxia requiring NRB, eval for effusion or pulm edema.
Impression: There is unchanged cardiomegaly. There is improvement of the pulmonary interstitial edema. There remains a left retrocardiac opacity. No pneumothoraces are seen.
